verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to the land <WH776> shadowing <WH6767> with wings, <WH3671> which <WH834> is beyond <WH4480> <WH5676> the rivers <WH5104> of Ethiopia: <WH3568>

That sendeth <WH7971> ambassadors <WH6735> by the sea, <WH3220> even in vessels <WH3627> of bulrushes <WH1573> upon <WH5921> <WH6440> the waters, <WH4325> saying, Go, <WH1980> ye swift <WH7031> messengers, <WH4397> to <WH413> a nation <WH1471> scattered <WH4900> and peeled, <WH4178> to <WH413> a people <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> from <WH4480> their beginning <WH1931> hitherto; <WH1973> a nation <WH1471> meted out <WH6957> <WH6957> and trodden down, <WH4001> whose <WH834> land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled! <WH958>

All <WH3605> ye inhabitants <WH3427> of the world, <WH8398> and dwellers <WH7931> on the earth, <WH776> see <WH7200> ye, when he lifteth up <WH5375> an ensign <WH5251> on the mountains; <WH2022> and when he bloweth <WH8628> a trumpet, <WH7782> hear <WH8085> ye.

For <WH3588> so <WH3541> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, I will take my rest, <WH8252> and I will consider <WH5027> in my dwelling place <WH4349> like a clear <WH6703> heat <WH2527> upon <WH5921> herbs, <WH216> and like a cloud <WH5645> of dew <WH2919> in the heat <WH2527> of harvest. <WH7105>

For <WH3588> before <WH6440> the harvest, <WH7105> when the bud <WH6525> is perfect, <WH8552> and the sour grape <WH1155> is <WH1961> ripening <WH1580> in the flower, <WH5328> he shall both cut off <WH3772> the sprigs <WH2150> with pruning hooks, <WH4211> and take away <WH5493> and cut down <WH8456> the branches. <WH5189>

They shall be left <WH5800> together <WH3162> unto the fowls <WH5861> of the mountains, <WH2022> and to the beasts <WH929> of the earth: <WH776> and the fowls <WH5861> shall summer <WH6972> upon <WH5921> them, and all <WH3605> the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776> shall winter <WH2778> upon <WH5921> them.

In that <WH1931> time <WH6256> shall the present <WH7862> be brought <WH2986> unto the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> of a people <WH5971> scattered <WH4900> and peeled, <WH4178> and from a people <WH4480> <WH5971> terrible <WH3372> from <WH4480> their beginning <WH1931> hitherto; <WH1973> a nation <WH1471> meted out <WH6957> <WH6957> and trodden under foot, <WH4001> whose <WH834> land <WH776> the rivers <WH5104> have spoiled, <WH958> to <WH413> the place <WH4725> of the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> the mount <WH2022> Zion. <WH6726>
